metadata.title: Editing & Deleting Contacts
metadata.category: Building a Contact Management App with Contacts

inlineContent.text: Learn how to edit existing contacts
create a new array to replace it.
Learn how to permanently delete contacts.
Add the contact to delete to CNSaveRequest.
Display a confirmation dialog before deleting.
Implement an edit screen in SwiftUI.
What is the first thing you need to do to edit a CNContact?
Since CNContact is immutable, you need to create
Create a new CNContact and replace
Use mutableCopy() to modify an existing contact.
What method is used to delete a contact?
CNContactStore doesn’t have a direct delete method.
Add the contact to delete to CNSaveRequest
The contact itself doesn’t have a delete method.

doc://contacts.HIGContacts/tutorials/Tab.title: Building a Contact Management App with Contacts

abstract.text: Access iOS contact data to build
a complete contact management app.
Learn how to access various properties of CNContact
and display contact details.
Learn the core concepts of the Contacts framework and
how to set up permissions for accessing contacts.
Learn how to track contact changes
and synchronize them with your app.
Learn how to search contacts using various conditions
and how to use Predicates.

and how to use Predicates.
Learn how to create and manage contact groups,
and add/remove contacts from groups.
Use the system contact picker UI to let
users select contacts.
Learn how to properly set up and manage
a CNContactStore for use throughout your app.
